record.properties: Top = 334 Left = 91 Width = 765 Height = 493 DataSource = .NULL. Name = "Dataenvironment"
Top = 23 Left = 44 Height = 232 Width = 251 Alias = "mr_instances" Order = "iname" Database = ..\data\data1.dbc CursorSource = "mr_instances" Name = "Cursor2"
Top = 11 Left = 341 Height = 295 Width = 122 Alias = "mr_jijs" Database = ..\data\data1.dbc CursorSource = "mr_jijs" Name = "Cursor3"
Top = 49 Left = 493 Height = 233 Width = 228 Alias = "mr_jijs1" Database = ..\data\data1.dbc CursorSource = "mr_jijs" Name = "Cursor1"
Top = 0 Left = 0 DoCreate = .T. Caption = "JIJ" mr_iguid = .F. uniqueid = 27BA27FF71AE410DB1203389AA8F7135 Name = "MR_MODS_JIJ" tmrSql.Name = "tmrSql"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE init2 *!* init2
local iguid
if not empty(thisform.p1)
thisform.mr_iguid = thisform.p1
else
thisform.mr_iguid = _inigetvalue('MR_INSTANCES_IGUID', '00000000')
endif
thisform.mr_setinstance()
ENDPROC PROCEDURE mr_setinstance *!* mr_setinstance
if thisform.mr_iguid = '00000000' and reccount('mr_instances') > 0 then
go top in 'mr_instances'
endif
if seek(thisform.mr_iguid, 'mr_instances', 'iguid') = .t.
if empty(mr_instances.iname) then
thisform.caption = 'JIJ - ' + _shortenpath(mr_instances.ifolder, 240)
else
thisform.caption = 'JIJ - ' + _shortenpath(mr_instances.iname, 240)
endif
set filter to mr_jijs.iguid == thisform.mr_iguid in 'mr_jijs'
else
thisform.setall('ENABLED', .f.)
thisform.tbinstances.enabled = .t.
thisform.caption = 'JIJ - NO INSTANCE SELECTED'
endif
go top in 'mr_jijs'
thisform.updateui()
thisform.refresh() ENDPROC PROCEDURE updateui *!* updateui
local icaption, sep
thisform.edit1.value = mr_jijs.jmod
m.sep = space(3)
m.icaption = ' ' + ; 'GUID: ' + mr_instances.iguid + m.sep + ; 'NAME: ' + mr_instances.iname + m.sep + ; 'VERSION ' + mr_instances.iminecraft + m.sep + ; 'LOADER: ' + mr_instances.iloader + m.sep + ; 'MINVER: ' + mr_instances.gver1 + m.sep + ; 'MAXVER: ' + mr_instances.gver2 + m.sep + ; 'PATH: '
m.icaption = m.icaption + _shortenpath(mr_instances.ifolder, 255 - len(m.icaption))
thisform.lblinstance.caption = m.icaption
m.url = strextract(mr_jijs.jmod, '"homepage": "', '"')
thisform.tbhomepage.enabled = not empty(m.url)
m.url = strextract(mr_jijs.jmod, '"sources": "', '"')
thisform.tbsources.enabled = not empty(m.url)
m.url = strextract(mr_jijs.jmod, '"issues": "', '"')
thisform.tbissues.enabled = not empty(m.url)
ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 408 Height = 28 Width = 84 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_autorenew_black_18dp.png Caption = "SCAN" ToolTipText = "SCAN MODS FOLDER" ZOrderSet = 4 Name = "tbscan"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click
mr_jarinjar_scan(mr_instances.iguid, mr_instances.ifolder)
go top in 'mr_jijs'
thisform.updateui()
thisform.refresh()
ENDPROC

PROCEDURE Click m.url = strextract(mr_jijs.jmod, '"issues": "', '"')

endif
ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 240 Height = 28 Width = 72 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_description_black_18dp.png Caption = "JSON" ToolTipText = "OPEN JSON IN NEW WINDOW" ZOrderSet = 4 tbmarginv = 4 Name = "tbjson"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click Local cfile
m.cfile = _getapppath() + 'json'
If Not Directory(m.cfile, 1)
Mkdir(m.cfile)
Endif
If Not Empty(mr_jijs.jmod)
m.cfile = m.cfile + '\' + mr_jijs.jij + '-fabric.mod.json.txt'
Endif
Strtofile(mr_jijs.jmod, m.cfile)
mr_shellexecute(m.cfile)
ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 312 Height = 28 Width = 84 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_description_black_18dp.png Caption = "LIST TO CLIPBOARD" ToolTipText = "OPEN JSON IN NOTEPAD" ZOrderSet = 4 tbmarginv = 4 Name = "_tbcommand1"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click Local txt
Select mr_jijs1
Calculate Max(Len(mr_jijs1.filename)) To m.padfilename Calculate Max(Len(mr_jijs1.jij)) To m.padjij Calculate Max(Len(mr_jijs1.modid )) To m.padmodid
m.txt = ''
Scan
m.txt = m.txt + Padr(mr_jijs1.filename, m.padfilename, ' ') + ','
m.txt = m.txt + Padr(mr_jijs1.jij, m.padjij, ' ') + ','
m.txt = m.txt + Transform(mr_jijs1.jijlevel) + ','
m.txt = m.txt + mr_jijs1.modid + 0h0d0a
Endscan
_Cliptext = m.txt
ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 924 Height = 28 Width = 28 FontSize = 8 Picture = ..\res\3bars.png Caption = "" TabIndex = 7 ToolTipText = "MENU" ZOrderSet = 21 tbalign = 2 tbautowidth = .F. tbpictureautosize = .F. tbmenuoffseth = 6 tbautofontsize = .F. tbmarginv = 4 Name = "tbmenu"
FontSize = 8 Anchor = 14 Caption = "" Height = 15 Left = 12 Top = 480 Width = 936 autowidth = .F. Name = "lblinstance"

record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click _inisetvalue('MR_INSTANCES_IGUID', thisform.mr_iguid)
do form mr_instances ENDPROC PROCEDURE dropdownclick Local iguid, nselect, result
m.nselect = select()
use 'mr_instances' again in 0 order tag 'INAME' alias 'menu_instances'
select 'menu_instances'
scan
this.tbmenuitemadd(recno('menu_instances'), 0, 0, 0, 0, menu_instances.iname + ' - ' + menu_instances.ifolder)
endscan
m.result = this.tbmenushow()
if m.result > 0 then
go m.result in 'menu_instances'
thisform.mr_iguid = menu_instances.iguid
endif
use in 'menu_instances'
_restorearea(m.nselect)
if m.result > 0 then
thisform.mr_setinstance()
endif ENDPROC

record.properties: FontName = "Consolas" Anchor = 13 Height = 276 Left = 348 ReadOnly = .T. Top = 36 Width = 600 Name = "edit1"
